snippet: With Alex Rodriguez stranding two teammates — to go with the four he left on in Game 1 — Joe Girardi was given the chance to revisit whether Rodriguez should be moved out of the No. 3 spot.
lead_paragraph: With Alex Rodriguez stranding two teammates — to go with the four he left on in Game 1 — Joe Girardi was given the chance to revisit whether Rodriguez should be moved out of the No. 3 spot.

headline.seo: Missed Chances Mount as Do Questions of Alex Rodriguez’s Place in Order
headline.main: Missed Chances Mount as Do Questions of Rodriguez’s Place in Order
headline.print_headline: Missed Chances Mount as Do Questions of Rodriguez’s Place in Order
